col2_html.content:
Building on the amazing success of our first Paint like Michelangelo at the Michelangelo series of painting classes, we are proud to announce the 2nd class on September 19th at 6pm. Guests get to learn how to paint (we will be painting Gondola in Venice) while enjoying some of the finest Italian wines and Hors d’ oeuvres. Perfect evening to spend some quality time with friends and family!

Seats are limited. Please purchase your tickets online at https://www.rezclick.com/paintinglounge/index.php.

Looking forward to seeing the painter in you!!!
